title: Renewable jobs lagging behind clean energy deployment
description: A report from International Labor Organization and IRENA says the ‘human side’ of the energy transition is being overlooked.
content: A report from International Labor Organization and IRENA says the ‘human side’ of the energy transition is being overlooked.
